scripts.build:types: yarn rimraf packages/types/dist && yarn webpack --config packages/types/webpack.config.js --env=types
scripts.build:vital: yarn rimraf packages/vital/dist && yarn webpack --config packages/vital/webpack.config.js --env=vital
scripts.build:native: yarn rimraf packages/react-native/dist && yarn webpack --config packages/react-native/webpack.config.js --env=native
scripts.build: yarn build:types && yarn build:vital && yarn build:native
